## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT5G11270](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT5G11270)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>OCP3</u>
- **Gene Name:** overexpressor of cationic peroxidase 3
- **Description:**   overexpressor of cationic peroxidase 3;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Plant Ontology Annotations:
   - [PO:0009005](https://browser.planteome.org/amigo/term/PO:0009005)&nbsp;---&nbsp;root&nbsp;---&nbsp;raíz (Spanish, exact), radices (exact, plural), radix (exact), 根 (Japanese, exact), aerial root (narrow), climbing root (narrow)
## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [ocp3]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Constitutive expression of GST1 and PDF1-2. Increased accumulation of H2O2. Enhanced resistance to necrotrophic pathogens.
## Function-related keywords:
   - [root](/tags/root/)
